text: Samsung Galaxy Note 3 is a Android smartphone developed and made by Samsung electronics. It was announced at IFA 2013 on September 4, 2013. It was released on September 25, 2013. It has a features including 5.7 inch Super AMOLED display, 3200mAh battery capacity, 3GB RAM, and improved camera. It comes with three colors such as jet black, classic white and blush pink. == History == On December 2, 2013, Samsung Galaxy Note 3 have a two new colors such as rose gold and red. == Related pages == *Samsung Galaxy Note *Samsung Galaxy S4 == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2013 Category:Samsung Galaxy Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: Samsung Galaxy Note 3
